name: Journal Diary
summary:
Ichitsuki is a boy with lemon-shaped hair who can't seem to leave his room for some reason, he just backs away from the door out of his hallway. Poor kid, maybe his dreams will tell us what's wrong, in some strange cryptic way?

This game is a Yume Nikki fangame. There are two types of collectibles in this fangame; effects and memories. Can you tell which type is good or bad?
